name: NORTH EAST CENTRE FOR EQUITY ACTION ON INTEGRATED DEVELOPMENT NE AID

address: House no 68, Daradi Bhawan, Besides No2 Madhabpur, Noonmati-Kharguli Road

briefDescription: North East Centre for Equity Action on Integrated Development (NEAID) with an aim to maximise and facilitate potential change in schools of Northeast India is pushing boundaries to lead a paradigm shift in the schools of northeast India. Working towards enabling a systemic shift and thereby ensuring joyful and quality learning, encouraging curiosity and innovation in children, NEAID in the past few years has made an important headway in whole-school transformation of schools in the region. A non-profit organization dedicated to the cause of sustainable and integrated development based initiatives, the organisation’s prime objective focuses on core thematic areas of children’s education and health.
